name: PolicyConditionType
title: Policy Condition Type
description: Types of conditions, warranties, and requirements attached to a policy.

concept.definition: A statement of fact or promise by the insured that must remain true throughout the policy period.
A requirement that specific safety equipment (sprinklers, alarms, etc.) be maintained as a condition of coverage.
A general obligation the insured must fulfill for coverage to apply, such as prompt notice of loss.
A condition that must be satisfied before the carrier's obligation to pay arises.
A statement made by the insured during the application process that the carrier relies upon in issuing the policy.
